data.message: please click and like this page for regularly updated information and inspirational messages regarding a universal anti-hatred campaign. We NEED to be heard. Using the negativity for motivation, and teaching the uninformed that their short-term gratification can lead to long-term effects. Our message is to not give them the reaction they look for. Wyclef Jean tweeted it to his 2.5 million followers, our message is different an different is good. Watch and follow us as we get louder for you!
